headline: Corning (GLW) Valuation Check After Strong Multi‑Period Share Price Momentum
summary: Corning: recent price moves catch investor attention Corning (GLW) has drawn fresh attention after a sharp share price move, with the stock showing strong recent returns over the past month and past three months compared with its earlier performance. headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Slip As Growth And Inflation Jitters Linger
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Feb, 23 2026 US stock futures are pointing lower this morning, with S&P 500 contracts down around 0.5% and Nasdaq 100 futures off about 0.6%, as investors weigh mixed signals on growth and inflation. The US 10 year Treasury yield is near 4.07% after tariff headlines raised uncertainty around trade costs, which can feed into prices for many everyday goods. At the same time, the Fed’s preferred inflation gauge, the core PCE index, is running...
